1.content:
I cant believe how small I am... Im gonna get squished, arent I? Or eaten? Or stepped on? Oh my god... what if I never get any bigger than this again? The funny thing is... just this morning I had been 5 foot six....

Well, you're probably wondering who I am by now... my name is Bobby Gaines, and my story is a sad one, but could be happier if you choose wisely. I got shrunk one day and... well...

The person who shrunk me was...
1.title: Pick a storyline

choices: Decided to try it, what harm could it do?
Refused her, started to walk off
11.content:
My friend Kim had invited me over one day, being fairly mysterious as to why, but I decided to stop by anyway.

I walked up to her house and was kind of creeped out to see noone else around, no other cars. I knocked on her door and she seemed very eager to get me inside.

"Come, come" she said, acting a little too friendly as she took me into her spacious kitchen. "Just stand over there, please"

"Huh? Why over there??" I asked.

"Look, just go" she said, now begginning to physically shove me over to a spot in the middle of the room.

"Im not just gonna go!!" I shouted at last, sort of throwing her arms off of me now.

"Ok, sorry..." she sighed, now going behind her cabinet to get something "Guess I should have told you..."

Kim takes out a silver laser gun of some sort. I jump back startled but after a while of her not firing, I decide to hear her out.

"Look, I have to do a project for science..." Kim explained "And I decided for my project to shrink one of my friends..."

"What??" I asked in shock "You mean you wanna... make me small??"

"3 inches tall" she answered "But only for a while, pleeeease??"

"I...I dont know..." I said.

She asked again and I...
11.title: The science project

choices: Let me get acclamated to my new size
111.content:
"Ok..." I sighed, as I almost let her push me to the designated spot "I guess you can shrink me..."

"Yay!" she exclaimed with glee, a little TOO excited. "Now hold still, this shouldnt hurt"

I closed my eyes and wanted it to end, as she shot me with the beam. It didnt hurt, but it felt weird, and I looked up as Kim grew and grew.

"Ok..." I said, hearing my voice grow quieter and quieter "Am I small enough yet??"

"Nope" she said, smiling as she watched me shrink "A couple more feet..."

"A couple more FEET??" I asked, startled.

She finally stopped the shrinking and brought me up to her counter. She set a ruler next to me and I came up to the 3 inch mark on it. She had really made me 3 inches tall!

"So, how do you like your new size?" she smiled.

"Uh...uh..." I stammered. I didnt know what to say... Kim's face was huge and I was so tiny...

Then she...
111.title: Going down

1111.content:
Kim picked me up and brought me close to her face. And when you're my size, her face was huge! I was only about the size of her nose!

"Good. No aftereffects. And the ray was able to shrink your clothes as well. Perfect."

"Yeah, but now what?" I grumbled. Had it been anyone else, I wouldn't have done it. But Kim was like a sister to me, even if we fight a whole lot less than your average brother and sister.

"Well, you'll have to stay with me tonight. You can't survive on your own." There's nothing like feeling helpless. It's not fun. Kim began walking towards her room. "I've got a place all made out. I still have an old dollhouse that I used to play with. It's just your size. I hope you don't mind." Great. Living in a dollhouse. What fun. But I kept my mouth shut. After all, this was only for a day or two, right? "Oops!" Kim tripped...
1111.title: Mini Me

11111.content:
"Ok..." Kim said, carrying me gently into her bedroom "Now I'm just gonna set you down over... WHOA!!"

Kim trips and she fumbles me.... I fall and roll...
11111.title: Dropped

111111.content:
I land in a heap right in front of her feet. She looks down at me with sympathy... I couldn't believe this... I felt like nothing more than a bug as she picks me back up.

"Oh, I'm so sorry" Kim said, holding me in her palm.

"Whatever..." I sighed, thinking that this might have been a bad idea... being this small, I was completely helpless, she couldve squished me if she wanted to. "Just put me in my dollhouse..."

So, Kim lays me down in front of my temporary home, which is...
111111.title: Picked up

choices: ... you just want to be more."
1111111.content:
my tepuary home looked like a giant four seasons and it was very luxarius and commfy really.
"SO HOW DO YOU LIKE YOUR NEW HOME?" Kim asked. "I love it, but i can't help but shake the feeling that...
1111111.title: just like a mansion

1111112.content:
"Its kind of cramped..." I complain

"Well its only for a little while..." Kim says.

"How long?" I ask
1111112.title: Cramped

choices: Got caught in a spider web
111112.content: I get thrown under her dusty bed and gasp, looking around in fear at my dark new surroundings. I could only see a sliver of light, and ran towards it, but...
111112.title: Dark and dusty

11112.content:
Kim stumbled, but kept upright. I was glad she hadn't dropped me. However, I seemed to be getting larger. Kim didn't seem quite as big as before. But everything else was still huge...

"Blast it," said Kim. "I just shrunk myself."

Just then, Kim's sister came rushing past us as she came home from a friend's house. It felt like an earthquake. When it was over, both Kim and I decided to make for the dollhouse.

After a lot, and I mean a lot, of hard work and walking for what seemed like miles, we reached Kim's room. Luckily, Kim had a phone in her room, and we were able to climb the cord and get in the dollhouse. We were both sweating profusely.

After a quick break, Kim showed me around the house. Stan, the genius in our class, had helped her rig it with such things as running water and a miniature radio (he couldn't make a TV that small). Kim had even put doll clothes in the closet. After the tour was over, Kim grabbed a dress and disappeared into the shower to clean off all the sweat. After she was done, I grabbed some doll jeans and a T-shirt and followed suit. Surprisingly, the doll clothes fit.

Both of us were exhausted, and we realized that it was almost eleven at night. Deciding that we'd worry about our "small" problem later, we made for the bedroom.

And wouldn't you know it. This humongous dollhouse (well, it seemed fairly large from our viewpoint), and the only beds were a crib for a baby doll and a double bed for Kim's husband and wife dolls.

Kim cast me an awkward look. I cast one right back. Neither of us was too thrilled about sharing the bed. We may be good friends, but we weren't boyfriend/girlfriend. At this point, I was too exhausted to care, and apparently so was she. We flopped down and were asleep right away.
11112.title: In the Dollhouse

choices: Call Stan using the giant phone
111121.content:
I woke up before Kim, and glanced at the minute clock. 5:04 AM. It's a normal time for me to get up; I've always been an early riser on school days. This way, I could make up any last-minute homework. However, today was different. We had to get unshrunk, or we'd never have to worry about homework again.

I gently shook Kim awake. Both of our outfits were quite wrinkled, so we turned our backs to each other and changed. Then we decided that we needed a plan.
111121.title: Need A Plan...

1111211.content:
We decided to ask Kim's family for help. They already knew about me from Kim's project anyway. The problem remained of how to get downstairs...

We jumped down onto the floor, looking for something. You find...
1111211.title: How To Get Downstairs...

choices: ...into Kim's sister's room, & she was putting on makeup
11112111.content: Kim and I dragged (with some difficulty) the paper airplane to the edge of the stairs. I helped Kim on, then lept on myself, causing it to lurch. We were off! We flew out of control down the stairs and...
11112111.title: Taking Flight

111121111.content:
We tumbled off of the plane as it swerved unexpectedly. We landed on a giant jiggly blob. A bit of it went into my mouth. "Okay, seriously, who has Jell-o for breakfast?"

Kim groaned. "My sister! Run!" However, running only made us sink further. Then came the giant spoon. I looked up to see Marissa. She looked quite sleepy and wasn't paying attention. She picked both of us up with some Jell-o, and put us in her mouth.

Kim and I were both screaming. Luckily, we avoided her teeth, but we were quickly swallowed. Down, down, down we went, dropping like the stock market did on Black Tuesday. We hit Marissa's stomach acid with a splash.

Kim heard me hit the acid and swam to me. The stomach acid was eating through our clothes quite rapidly, although that was the least of our worries, especially because we couldn't see anything anyway. The acid was eating at our skin as well.
111121111.title: Breakfast

choices: Try to broadcast a thought to Marissa
Hope to be flushed from her system eventually
1111211111.content:
We were washed into Marissa's small intestine, where we were ensared by the villi. We couldn't breathe, and the acid was burning like crazy. Not to mention the villi seemed to be absorbing us. I began to feel a peculiar sensation. I began seeing through Marissa's eyes, feeling what she felt, smelling what she smelled, thinking what she thought. I had no control over anything.

"Bobby?" The voice sounded like Kim's, though stranger. I couldn't see Kim at all, though. I tried to move my mouth, but couldn't. Kim's voice came again. "Just think what you need to say."

"Kim, is that you?" I heard myself think it, if that made any sense.

"Yes. Somehow, when we were shrunk, we became immune to being broken down by the acid. We've been absorbed into Marissa's bloodstream, and now our minds have combined with Marissa's, so we are seeing what she sees and stuff."

"So, basically, I've become your sister, only I have no control over anything I do?"

"Yeah, pretty much."

"Well, I'm not enjoying being a girl. What happens when she has to take a shower or something? We can't shut our own eyes! Not to mention we're hearing all of her girly thoughts and feeling all of her hormones. It might be okay for you, but it's grossing me out!"

"But what can we do?"
1111211111.title: You are what you eat...

11112111111.content: I focused on trying to communicate with Marissa.
11112111111.title: Communication

111121111112.content: I guess our minds weren't compatible with hers or something. Anyway, we couldn't figure out anything to get us out of her mind. We were forced to watch her grow up as if we were watching a much too realistic movie that wouldn't stop. It took me a while to adjust to the gender flip, but after a week of constant estrogen and the fact that I didn't have another choice, I got used to it. We also felt her feelings, and went through the agony as Marissa and the rest of her family discovered we were gone. It was even more agonizing because we were there, just unable to communicate.
111121111112.title: Stuck

choices: Marissa and Stan live happily ever after
1111211111121.content: Marissa had fallen in love with, of all people, my old friend Stan. Of course, we could read her thoughts, and knew that they would get married eventually. They did, and every once in a while our names would be brought up, but we still couldn't let them know how near we were.
1111211111121.title: Marraige

11112111111211.content: Well, that was that. We just lived through Marissa for the rest of her life.
11112111111211.title: The End

11112111111212.content:
After a while, as is what happens with most married couples, Marissa became pregnant. Kim and I had just been discussing our lives before her shrinking machine had zapped us, as we did normally to keep our minds seperated from Marissa's, when I felt something suck at me.

I was seperated from Marissa's mind somehow. Although I couldn't see, I realized that I must be very small. I seemed to be connected through my stomach to a wall. It hit me then what I was. I was Marissa's baby! Apparently, her body had tired of having three minds in one, so the first chance that came, her body ejected me into her baby. Well, this could cause a nasty shock when the proud parents find out who I really am.
11112111111212.title: Just a Baby

choices: I still remember who I am
111121111112121.content: I grew at a quick rate and it was soon time for me to be born.
111121111112121.title: Happy Birthday (Part 1)

1111211111121211.content: I squeezed out of Marissa's body. The doctor cut the cord and lifted my tiny body.
1111211111121211.title: Gender?

11112111111212111.content: I breathed a tiny sigh of relief. I had my old body, although younger, back after all these years! I tried to speak, but unfortunately my vocal chords hadn't developed enough yet. I'd just have to wait until I was a little older to reveal my story.
11112111111212111.title: Happy Birthday!  (Part 2)

choices: I tell the story and they believe me
I tell the story, but I'm too young for them to believe it
111121111112121111.content:
The days passed, and I was the center of attention for the entire extended family. I could see Kim's mom, 20 years older than the last time I had seen her with my "own" eyes. I saw Stan and his family, strange that my friend Stan was my father. Everytime I looked into my new mother's eyes, I knew that Kim was behind them, watching me develop and hoping one day she was released from her perpetual prison also. It felt so terrible, worse than being imprisoned. I was there, right there! I knew who I was, knew what to say.... but I couldn't. Not yet. With the feelings of hope, weeks passed, and then months, soon years were flying by. I was such a well behaved baby. I could tell what was happening, and never made a mess or cried at night... or cried at all. I was making friends who were 2 or 3 years old, and to say the least, it was interesting. Then it finally came. I was walking through the house one day, when I tripped and my bottle flew out of my hands.
"Shit!" I squeaked.
Wow. I think I'm the first baby in history to have a curse be his first word. Then a shadow loomed over me. I looked up to see "mom" looking at me, frowning.
"No, no, we don't say that w..... Oh...oh my god!!!! Stan! Stanley! He talked! HE TALKED!!!!!!"
Indeed I did.... perhaps, when I can force more words out, I'll tell my story to them. I can only hope they believe me.
111121111112121111.title: Growing up

1111211111121211111.content:
And so i told them everything, i began with the experiment, and continued through all the facts, everything, right down to the slightest detail. All the years of waiting and finally this. At first i thought they did not believe me, but then stan said-

"It all makes sense,"

"WHAT" yelled Marissa, "how does this make sense? How is this possible?!"

"Well," began stan, "I think your soals mended together upone injestion.It makes sense if you think about it. Once they were inside of you, you began to digest their physical being but not their mental being. So the mntal being needed somplace to go, so it went into your mind, they have been able to see and feel what you have been doing this whole time, as if it were them doing it." Marissa just sat there mesmerized.

"still the genius you always have been!" i said

"I...I am so sorry..." she began"...i ruined your lives and prcticaly killed you, and kim is till inside me...?"

"yes,' i replied.

"i am going to fix this!" said stan "i must fix this, i am sure i know how to create a machine that will set back time, i just need the right material."

"are you sure that is possible?" i asked.

"well, i helped make a shrink ray, That is even less possible." And with that he rushed out of the room, and i continued to live my life as a young kid. We haldly ever saw stan for the next year, but we knew that he was doing what was right, and i knew Kim knew what was happening, i saw it every time i looked into Marissa's eyes.





It was a cold december when stan announced his discovery. He told use he had developed a machien that will turn back time, and leave our memories blank of all time in between. It works by spinning a large barrel inside, causing a gravitational pull, then magnetic fields bend this gravity in one direction to foarce a large arm to spin at great speeds. These speeds should bend time enough to send everything back, depending on what speed it is spinning at.

"okay, according to my findings, the set speed will send everything back to the day of the experiment, lets just hope that it goes differently...." stan said, and with that he flipped the switch.






"so what did you want me to do for this experiment?" I asked

"Well i was going to try to shrink you, but for some reason all the power got sucked out of the ray gun, as well as every other battery in the house, and the car battery. And according to the news, every other battery in the world. stan said it was caused by some large bending in the fabric of th universe that needed allot of power" replied Kim.

"well who cares, for all we know he could have caused it, want to go get a pizza?"

"ok" Replied kim. Then you both left and walked dow the street, the whole 24 years wiped from your memories.
1111211111121211111.title: All will be normal

11112111111212112.content: I hiccuped in surprise. That was not part of my plan. I wasn't supposed to come back as a girl! I wanted my old body back! I had been trapped inside a girl's body too long; all I wanted was to be a guy again. I began to cry. Of course, everyone thought I was just being a normal baby, and my vocal chords hadn't developed enough to tell them my story. It wasn't fair! I didn't want to grow up as a girl! I looked up into Marissa's eyes and thought of Kim. I hoped for her sake that she would come back as a girl.
11112111111212112.title: Happy Birthday (Part 2)

1111211111121212.content: As I began to pass through Marissa's body, I began to forget who I was. The baby would have to develop it's own personality...
1111211111121212.title: Who am I?

11112111112.content: After a few days of what seemed like pure torture for all of my senses (I swear, I am not kissing a girl again for a long time!), I began to notice that my senses were dulling a little bit each time she went to the restroom (another torture). After a few days of this, everything went black.
11112111112.title: Fading Out

111121111121.content:
I awoke to find myself on a beach. Kim was lying near me. We were both perfectly normal, even full size again! After a moment of embarassment when we realized we weren't wearing anything, we both had layered on enough mud to not embarass each other as much.

"So, how'd we get here?" I asked.

Kim shrugged. "Over there is a pipe where water comes out of the waterworks. I'm guessing that as we were ejected from Marissa's system, our particles washed up here and built us up again." I shuddered, not wanting to think about the way in which we had left her system.

"So now what?"
111121111121.title: Back to Normal

choices: Do I sense an epilogue nearby?
Sadly, my problems had only begun...
1111211111211.content:
Luckily, it was very late at night, so I decided to "borrow" some clothes from a nearby thrift store, closed for the night. Apparently, we were in Marissa's body for four weeks instead of the couple days I thought. After the two of us got your clothes on, we sat down on the sand, next to each other. There was a bright crescent moon high in the sky, with long clouds parallel with the horizon. The waves were calmly lapping at the shore.

"Next time you ask me to test out a science project, remind me to say 'no.'" I said, breaking the silence

Kim laughed. "Agreed. I still don't understand what exactly happened back there. I mean, there shouldn't be any reason why we're still alive. Her stomach should have digested us, but how did our consciousness merge with Marissa's? And how'd we get our normal bodies back? And how..."

I seized this opportunity to kiss her on the lips, just like the movies. "Hey, don't worry about it. I'm actually glad we've escaped." Kim nodded dazed, reeling with surprise. "Well, I should imagine that our parents would be worried sick about us."

"Why don't we stay here for a while? A few more minutes isn't going to matter." I really liked that idea, and she grabbed my hand and we watched the moon together.
1111211111211.title: Token romantic ending?

111121111122.content: I just kind of faded out of her after a while, and then there was nothing left of me.
111121111122.title: Gone

1111211112.content: Kim and I clung to each other as the acid burnt us. We kept clinging to each other until we dissolved away, eaten by Kim's own sister. No one would ever know what had happened to us.
1111211112.title: Dissolved Away...

choices: Kim, who didn't like airplanes, threw up.
111121112.content: We were flung off the plane and landed in Kim's sister's hair. Marissa (that was her name) didn't notice. We were severly tangled in her braids. We tried to shout to her, but we were too small. Then...
111121112.title: A Hairy Situation

choices: Find a way to clean up
11112112.content:
I saw these giant marshmallows. And I don't just mean those large ones you put in hot cocoa. These were HUGE! Kim and I each rolled one over to the top of the stairs. "Here's the plan. We get inside the marshmallow ad bounce down the stairs. The marshmallow will cushion us.

"You have got to be kidding," muttered Kim, but she agreed. We squeezed ourselves inside the marshmallows and rolled ourselves down the stairs. It was very scary, falling without any idea where you're going, but we made it, and ate our way out of the marshmallow. Of course, now we were quite sticky...
11112112.title: A Sticky Situation

choices: trash bag about to be taken out
111121121.content: The stickiness form the marshmallows was still on us we decided it would be best to continue on and find someone instead of wasting our time trying to clean ourselves. I wish we did though. A shadow appeared over us and it then landed on us and after it was lifted back up it was...
111121121.title: Stuck on you like Glue

choices: no trash day for some reason
1111211212.content: Kim's dad placed the garbage bag unknowingly placed the trash bag on top of me and Kim. The bag was then brought outside and put into a garbage bin. The bag news was it was garbage day.
1111211212.title: trash bag about to be taken out

1112.content:
"Go on, walk around a little, Bobby" Kim said, in a soft, soothing voice. I looked back at her and nervously smiled. I looked around at everything and felt woozy... even the tiniest particle on the ground was worth noticing at over half my size. I stumble on her carpet and nearly trip, provoking a slight reaction from Kim, who tries to help me up.

"I'm fine..." I say nervously, my voice barely registering any sound compared to everything else around me.

"I know, I'm just making sure" Kim said.

Just then...
1112.title: Let me get acclamated to my new size

choices: Plucks me off the ground and throws me in a jar
Feel sympathetic for me and apologizes again
112.content:
"Kim..." I sighed, putting my hand on her shoulder, and getting her to lower the gun. "I'm not gonna get shrunk for your science project... I'm sorry..."

"But..." she started.

"No..." I said sternly, "I'm sorry..."

She huffed angrily as I walked the other way.

"Actually, I'M sorry..." Kim sighed.

"Why?" I asked.

"Sorry for shrinking you!" she chuckled and brought the gun back up. I started to run but not fast enough. The ray hits me and I start shrinking before her eyes, until I'm 3 inches tall. I scream with fear as she kneels down and looks at me closer. She then...
112.title: Shrunk anyway

choices: There really IS no science project
1121.content:
"Ha, I did it, I shrunk ya!" Kim chuckled, and threw me in a small jar that had my name on it in tape. I gasped in fear and looked up at her. What was going to happen to me now?

"Kim, why did you do this to me??" I asked, trapped in the glass jar.

Then, Kim admits...
1121.title: Jarred

11212.content:
Kim: Well bobby if you are that concerned about ill tell you. First there is no science project and second i just wanted to see what it would be like to have a someone really small.
Bobby looked at kim with a concerned face and says "so what will you do to me now?"
Kim gives bobby a smile and says "just wait and see" with that she covers the jar with some cloth and walks away she was heading too....
11212.title: EXPLANATION!

12.content:
It was gym class as our class ran the mile. Afterwards, I nearly passed out from exhaustion on the bleachers.

"Hey Bobby" Brittany S. said, sitting down next to me. Brittany was a very athletic girl who barely broke a sweat running the mile "You look kinda tired..."

"Yeah" I said "I am"

"Cmon, Ill show you something" Brittany said, and she dragged me back inside the school.

"Are you sure we're supposed to be in here??" I asked, as Brittany took me into some fairly unfamiliar rooms. I knew our school had showers but not a STEAM ROOM.

"Go in here" Brittany said finally, and I shrugged and decided to go in. I could use a little relaxation.

So Brittany shut the door behind me and I felt the steam fill the room, until the room got very hot and comfortable. Over time though, I just wanted out but the door was LOCKED!!

Finally the door opened, but it was to my HUGE surprise... Brittany was a giant!! The heat had shrunk me so much, I was only a few inches tall. Brittany looked down at me and...
12.title: Letting off some steam

122.content:
"Oh my god" she said in a very concerned voice "Wh-what happened to you??"

"I guess the heat was turned up too high..." I sighed,looking WAY up at the giant before me. I wanted to run, I was so scared but I quickly realized that wouldnt do much good. Brittany was probably the only one who couldve helped me. "Do you know how to help me??"

She sighed, and answered...
122.title: Concerned

1221.content: "Yeah we need to find some kind of chemical... it's only in..."
1221.title: The chemical cure

1222.content:
"No I'm sorry, I dont" Brittany said at last, "But I guess I could keep you as my pet"

"What? No!" I gasped

"It'll be okay, little guy"

Brittany gently stroked my head. I felt angry but helpless at the same time. What else could I do? She was giant and I was tiny. I had no chance but to say yes.
1222.title: Her little pet

choices: I stay where I am, paralyzed with fear
13.content:
I was walking down the halls one morning, just minding my own business as usual, when one of the hottest girls in school, Brittany K. passed by me.

Now today, as I mentioned was a day unlike any other, although one thing remained the same, Brittany had the nicest boobs any guy could ever hope to lay eyes on and I just HAPPENED to sneak my peek in at the wrong time.

I noticed that Brittany glared back at me, just at the same time I happened to glance at her "gifts". I backed off a bit, feeling embarassed she had seen me peek but that was the least of my worries for the moment... I was getting SHORTER!

"Thats what you get, you perv!" Brittany sighed, seeming to look at me and point her view down more. The more she stared down, the further DOWN I got, until I was only a few inches high. "Now come here, you!!"

She reached down and plucked me off the ground squeezing me tightly between 2 of her now massive fingers. I screamed and squirmed as she dropped me into her palms. I was completely helpless now as she stared down at me.

"Well well, LITTLE pervert" Brittany said with a satisfied smile.

"Ok...ok... Brittany..." I stuttered "Ive uh...learned my lesson,okay? Please... unshrink me now..."

"Heh, I dont think so..." Brittany said with an evil smile on her face "Youre gonna STAY small... for a couple days at least"

"Wha...? No!" I gasped.

"Be quiet, gnat" Brittany yelled. Of course she referred to me, as I was now about the size of a gnat. She couldve squished me if she wanted but apparently she took more joy in seeing me live as a bug. She now plucks me again and plunks me on the floor. "See ya, short stuff..."

She left me on the floor... I couldnt believe it!! I was so tiny now!! Then...
13.title: The BIG mistake

131.content: With my arms flailing, I run after her, but I unfortunately dont look where Im going, or whats coming. I get squished by a giant foot and die.
131.title: Squish!

132.content:
The lockers were like sky scrapers, the floor seemed to go on forever and the massive teenagers that surrounded me... well from their point of view I was probably just a bug to them as I scampered across the never ending world around me.

I was so scared I could barely move, barely twitch, I couldnt find Brittany even if I tried, I had to crane my neck far up just to see anyone's face.

I run as Im almost squished many times and sidle along the sides of the wall. After my heart stops beating so fast, I'm able to retain my thought process.

What could I do? Brittany said my size change was only for a couple days, so I suppose I could survive that long, but I'd have to find a friend of mine to help... but who?
132.title: Paralyzed with fear

choices: Notices me and wants to help me
Notices me but wanted to shrink me the whole time
14.content:
"Bobby" my friend Ashley says "Go get some of that Tri-glycerin nitrate"

So, I walk over to the chem cabinet and take it out. Ashley and I were good friends and lab partners and we had just 5 minutes of class left to finish this lab. I hand Ashley the glowing red beaker.

"Thanks" she said, pouring it into our mixture, "Now stand back..."

So, we stand back, waiting to observe some form of chemical reaction but instead nothing happens. We wait, and still nothing. Then I snap my fingers.

"We need the copper nitrate!!" I shouted, and ran to get it. I grab the green vial and put just a couple drops into it but suddenly there's a puff of smoke that surrounds me and only me.

Ashley steps back and gasps as Im enveloped from head to toe in smoke. When it's over, I see the giant shadow of Ashley emerge... wait, that IS Ashley... Im only 3 inches tall!!

The formula's explosion somehow shrunk me. Now Ashley...
14.title: Chemical Accident

141.content:
Ashley plucks me up by my shirt and drops me onto the cold lab bench. I look up at her, afraid she was going to hurt me, and beging to scramble away.

"Bobby..." she says "I'm not going to hurt you... I honestly don't know how this happened to you, but I'd like to help..."

"Ok..." I said, sighing with relief, "But how?"

"Maybe by..."
141.title: Concern

15.content:
I wake up in bed one morning to see that everything has changed suddenly. My blankets seem to cover all of me, not just my lower body. In fact, Im lost in a sea of fabric.

I finally get out and shriek to see a pillow the size of a small building. I look up and all around and become startled. Could it be???

I had been SHRUNK!!

But how? I was only 3 inches tall now... but I couldn't panic. Unfortunately there wasn't much left to do... I was so small... I scream for help but noone can hear me...

Then I hear someone coming, its...
15.title: Waking up small

choices: get the cat his well-promised tuna
151.content:
My cat comes in and sees me, and somehow TALKS to me!

"I will get you back to normal if you give me a tuna for lunch today"

"DEAL!" I said, and i was suddenly normal again, HOORAY FOR QUICK ENDINGS!
151.title: My cat

1511.content:
"Heres your tuna."

The cat ate the tuna

THE END
1511.title: get the cat his well-promised tuna

152.content:
Mom opened the door. She was wearing a robe and a pair of slippers.
"Bobby, honey, are you here?", she said.
"I'm here mom!", I yelled, but she didn't hear me.
I slided down the sheets and ran towards my mother. When I reached her, I stared in awe at her enormous and powerful body (compared to me). Her foot alone was larger than me! I had to get her attention, but how?
152.title: Big momma

1521.content: I decided to climb her and suddenly i grew to normal size, i found it kinda awkward i was still holding her clothes
1521.title: Climb her.

info.brief_description: I get shrunk one day, now what will happen to me? Will I ever be unshrunk?
info.description: I get shrunk one day.. doesn't matter how, maybe a friend does it to me, maybe it just happens, point is Im now only 3 inches tall, and I need some help. Add to my story if you wish and try to get me unshrunk...please! I dont want to STAY this tiny!
